${ModID}:Scroll.NAME: Ninja Scroll
${ModID}:Scroll.FLAVOR: This scroll details a mission which you do not recognize.
DESCRIPTIONS: Start each combat with an additional [E] .

${ModID}:Boots.NAME: Stomping Boots
${ModID}:Boots.FLAVOR: First I put on my left stomping boot. It's quite stompy, and a particular favorite of mine.
DESCRIPTIONS: Whenever you apply a debuff to an enemy, they lose #b2 HP.
